barker_notes.barker_summary: Order for lead in favor of Moses Austin.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 217

div1.p: Order for lead in favor of Moses Austin.
Sir please to pay Mr. Moses Austin on order three hundred pounds of Lead and this shall be your Receipt for the same
